concepts.name: Algebra
concepts.description: Study of mathematical symbols and rules for manipulating these symbols

concepts.name: Equations
concepts.description: Mathematical statements that assert the equality of two expressions

concepts.name: Polynomials
concepts.description: Expressions consisting of variables and coefficients

concepts.name: Matrices
concepts.description: Rectangular arrays of numbers used in linear algebra

concepts.name: Calculus
concepts.description: Study of continuous change, including derivatives and integrals

concepts.name: Derivatives
concepts.description: Rate of change of a function with respect to a variable

concepts.name: Integrals
concepts.description: Measurement of the area under a curve

concepts.name: Limits
concepts.description: Value a function approaches as input approaches a certain value

concepts.name: Geometry
concepts.description: Study of shapes, sizes, positions, and dimensions

concepts.name: Polygons
concepts.description: Closed shapes with straight sides

concepts.name: Circles
concepts.description: Set of points equidistant from a center point

concepts.name: Trigonometry
concepts.description: Study of relationships between sides and angles of triangles

concepts.name: Sine & Cosine
concepts.description: Basic trigonometric functions relating angles to ratios of sides

concepts.name: Statistics
concepts.description: Study of collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data

concepts.name: Probability
concepts.description: Study of likelihood and uncertainty of events

concepts.name: Linear Algebra
concepts.description: Study of linear equations and linear functions

concepts.name: Mechanics
concepts.description: Study of motion and forces acting on objects

concepts.name: Kinematics
concepts.description: Study of motion without considering forces

concepts.name: Dynamics
concepts.description: Study of forces and their effects on motion

concepts.name: Thermodynamics
concepts.description: Study of heat, energy, and their relationships

concepts.name: Heat Transfer
concepts.description: Study of thermal energy movement between systems

concepts.name: Entropy
concepts.description: Measure of disorder in a thermodynamic system

concepts.name: Electromagnetism
concepts.description: Study of electrical and magnetic phenomena

concepts.name: Electric Fields
concepts.description: Region where electric forces act on charged particles

concepts.name: Magnetic Fields
concepts.description: Region where magnetic forces act on moving charges

concepts.name: Quantum Mechanics
concepts.description: Study of matter and energy at the atomic scale

concepts.name: Wave Functions
concepts.description: Mathematical descriptions of quantum states

concepts.name: Uncertainty
concepts.description: Fundamental limits on measurement precision

concepts.name: Optics
concepts.description: Study of light and its behavior

concepts.name: Reflection
concepts.description: Change in direction of light at an interface

concepts.name: Refraction
concepts.description: Bending of light as it passes through media

concepts.name: Relativity
concepts.description: Study of space, time, and gravity

concepts.name: Atomic Structure
concepts.description: Study of atoms and their components

concepts.name: Electron Configuration
concepts.description: Arrangement of electrons in atomic orbitals

concepts.name: Nuclear Chemistry
concepts.description: Study of atomic nuclei and radioactivity

concepts.name: Chemical Bonding
concepts.description: Study of how atoms combine to form molecules

concepts.name: Covalent Bonds
concepts.description: Sharing of electrons between atoms

concepts.name: Ionic Bonds
concepts.description: Transfer of electrons between atoms

concepts.name: Thermochemistry
concepts.description: Study of heat in chemical reactions

concepts.name: Reaction Kinetics
concepts.description: Study of rates of chemical reactions

concepts.name: Organic Chemistry
concepts.description: Study of carbon-based compounds

concepts.name: Functional Groups
concepts.description: Groups of atoms that give molecules characteristics

concepts.name: Stereochemistry
concepts.description: Study of spatial arrangement of atoms in molecules

concepts.name: Inorganic Chemistry
concepts.description: Study of non-carbon-based compounds

concepts.name: Coordination Chemistry
concepts.description: Study of metal complexes with ligands

concepts.name: Biochemistry
concepts.description: Study of chemical processes in living organisms

concepts.name: Metabolism
concepts.description: Chemical processes for maintaining life

concepts.name: Enzymes
concepts.description: Proteins that catalyze biochemical reactions
